results.title: Association of Metformin Use With Age-Related Macular Degeneration: A Case-Control Study.
results.text_hl: The common antidiabetic drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has been shown to have protective outcomes in multiple @<m>DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease_10</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564653 @@@age-associated diseases@@@ and may have the potential to protect against the development of @DISEASE_Macular_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D008268 @@@AMD@@@.

citations.NLM: Blitzer AL, Ham SA, Colby KA, Skondra D. Association of Metformin Use With Age-Related Macular Degeneration: A Case-Control Study. JAMA Ophthalmol. 2021 Mar 1;139(3):302-309. PMID: 33475696
citations.BibTeX: @article{33475696, title={Association of Metformin Use With Age-Related Macular Degeneration: A Case-Control Study.}, author={Blitzer AL and Ham SA and Colby KA and Skondra D}, journal={JAMA Ophthalmol}, volume={139}, number={3}, pages={302-309}}

results.title: Metformin reduces all-cause mortality and diseases of ageing independent of its effect on diabetes control: A systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ reduces all-cause mortality and @<m>DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease_10</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564653 @@@diseases of ageing@@@ independent of its effect on @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ control: A systematic review and meta-analysis.

citations.NLM: Campbell JM, Bellman SM, Stephenson MD, Lisy K. Metformin reduces all-cause mortality and diseases of ageing independent of its effect on diabetes control: A systematic review and meta-analysis. Ageing Res Rev. 2017 Nov;40():31-44. PMID: 28802803
